database.name: VIEW SCR_INOUT_BY_SALESORDER_V
database.view: SELECT DISTINCT COALESCE(a.m_inout_id, '-') || COALESCE(a.c_order_id, '-') AS scr_inout_by_salesorder_v_id, a.ad_client_id, a.ad_org_id, a.isactive, a.created, a.createdby, a.updated, a.updatedby, a.m_inout_id, a.em_scr_physical_documentno AS physical_documentno, a.description, a.documentno, a.docstatus, a.em_swa_shipstatus, a.m_warehouse_id, a.movementdate, a.c_bpartner_id, a.em_swa_combo_item_id AS scr_combo_item, a.c_order_id FROM (SELECT i.ad_client_id, i.ad_org_id, i.isactive, i.created, i.createdby, i.updated, i.updatedby, i.m_inout_id, i.documentno, i.em_scr_physical_documentno, i.description, i.docstatus, i.em_swa_shipstatus, i.m_warehouse_id, i.movementdate, i.c_bpartner_id, i.em_swa_combo_item_id, o.c_order_id FROM m_inout i JOIN m_inoutline il ON i.m_inout_id = il.m_inout_id JOIN c_orderline ol ON il.c_orderline_id = ol.c_orderline_id JOIN c_order o ON ol.c_order_id = o.c_order_id WHERE i.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SWARTVRECEIPT', 'SCOMMSHIPMENT', 'SWAMMDISPATCH') GROUP BY i.m_inout_id, o.c_order_id, i.ad_client_id, i.ad_org_id, i.isactive, i.created, i.createdby, i.updated, i.updatedby, i.documentno, i.em_scr_physical_documentno, i.description, i.docstatus, i.em_swa_shipstatus, i.m_warehouse_id, i.movementdate, i.c_bpartner_id, i.em_swa_combo_item_id UNION ALL SELECT i.ad_client_id, i.ad_org_id, i.isactive, i.created, i.createdby, i.updated, i.updatedby, i.m_inout_id, i.documentno, i.em_scr_physical_documentno, i.description, i.docstatus, i.em_swa_shipstatus, i.m_warehouse_id, i.movementdate, i.c_bpartner_id, i.em_swa_combo_item_id, o.c_order_id FROM m_inout i JOIN c_order o ON i.c_order_id = o.c_order_id WHERE i.em_sco_specialdoctype IN ('SWARTVRECEIPT', 'SCOMMSHIPMENT', 'SWAMMDISPATCH') GROUP BY i.m_inout_id, o.c_order_id, i.ad_client_id, i.ad_org_id, i.isactive, i.created, i.createdby, i.updated, i.updatedby, i.documentno, i.em_scr_physical_documentno, i.description, i.docstatus, i.em_swa_shipstatus, i.m_warehouse_id, i.movementdate, i.c_bpartner_id, i.em_swa_combo_item_id) a
